Name: Non Fingo VR
About the game: Non Fingo is a hyper-realistic VR Space Combat Simulator with spacecraft you can explore in Zero-G and control in detail to travel seamlessly throughout the galaxy (and blow up all the things you find there). N-body gravity acts on all the ships and projectiles, resulting in realistic orbital dynamics. Combat damage is tracked calculated and tracked precisely. Player movement in 0g is physics based. Check out the early access section to read about the road map and current state of the game, there's lots more to come. Join us in the discord if you have any questions!
